segments.text: I glance at the drawing and take in the details.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman polishes her plate meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet running, sink full, overflow starting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades down, pooling on the tile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's ankle-deep now, but smiles faintly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No, wait, her face is blank, missing it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids plot their cookie heist quietly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy stretches tall on the tilting stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl anticipates her cookie with wide eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sweet how they're teaming up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the slipperiness from water worries me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets drip, floor soaksâ€” what a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden beyond seems worlds away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a mix of amusement and concern here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hopefully, she turns soon and catches them.
segments.speaker: PAR
